text.headline: Welcome to SimpleStoryMapLibJS
text.text:
This is a demonstration of the new SimpleStoryMapLibJS library - a flexible, customizable story mapping tool that maintains maximum flexibility while providing clean distribution.

This example shows how easy it is to create interactive story maps with the new architecture.

text.headline: Getting Started
text.text:
SimpleStoryMapLibJS is designed to be both powerful and easy to use. You can get started with just a few lines of code:

const storyMap = new StoryMap({
jsonUrl: 'your-data.json',
mapProvider: 'standard'
});

The library handles all the complex map interactions, animations, and responsive design for you.

media.caption: New York City - A great place to start your story

text.headline: Flexible Architecture
text.text:
The new architecture provides maximum flexibility while maintaining clean, reusable code. You can customize:

• Map providers (PMTiles, Standard, Satellite, Mapbox)
• Data loading (Simple JSON, Multi-language, Custom)
• Media handling (YouTube, Images, Videos)
• Theming (Colors, fonts, spacing, animations)

Everything is designed to be overridden or extended as needed.

media.caption: London - Another amazing city for storytelling

text.headline: Multiple Data Formats
text.text:
SimpleStoryMapLibJS supports various data formats to fit your needs:

• Simple JSON for basic story maps
• Multi-language JSON for international content
• Custom data loaders for dynamic content

The library automatically detects and handles different data structures, making migration from existing tools seamless.

media.caption: Paris - The city of lights and stories

text.headline: Responsive & Accessible
text.text:
Every aspect of SimpleStoryMapLibJS is designed with accessibility and responsiveness in mind:

• Mobile-first design that works on all devices
• Keyboard navigation for accessibility
• Screen reader support with proper ARIA labels
• Dark mode support that respects user preferences
• Reduced motion support for users with motion sensitivity

Your stories will look great and work well for everyone.

text.headline: Ready for Production
text.text:
SimpleStoryMapLibJS is production-ready with:

• No build step required - works directly in browsers
• NPM/CDN distribution - easy to integrate anywhere
• Comprehensive documentation - everything you need to know
• Extensive theming system - customize to match your brand
• Developer-friendly API - easy to extend and modify

Start building amazing story maps today!
